locations.Dodongos Cavern GS Side Room Near Lower:
is_adult or has_explosives or
                (Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and (Slingshot or Boomerang or Sticks or Kokiri_Sword))
locations.Dodongos Cavern GS Scarecrow:
(can_use(Scarecrow) or can_use(Longshot) or (logic_dc_scarecrow_gs and (is_adult or
                (can_child_attack and (can_blast_or_smash or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade)))))
locations.Dodongos Cavern Torch Room Pot 1:
((has_explosives or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and
                (Slingshot or Sticks or Bombs or Kokiri_Sword)) or is_adult
locations.Dodongos Cavern Torch Room Pot 2:
((has_explosives or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and
                (Slingshot or Sticks or Bombs or Kokiri_Sword)) or is_adult
locations.Dodongos Cavern Torch Room Pot 3:
((has_explosives or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and
                (Slingshot or Sticks or Bombs or Kokiri_Sword)) or is_adult
locations.Dodongos Cavern Torch Room Pot 4:
((has_explosives or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and
                (Slingshot or Sticks or Bombs or Kokiri_Sword)) or is_adult
locations.Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Side Room Nea:
(can_blast_or_smash or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and
                (is_adult or Slingshot or Sticks or
                Bombs or Kokiri_Sword)
locations.Gossip Stone Fairy: can_summon_gossip_fairy and has_bottle and (can_blast_or_smash or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade)

exits.Dodongos Cavern Staircase Room:
here(is_adult or ((has_explosives or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and (Sticks or
                    (can_use(Dins_Fire) and (Slingshot or Bombs or Kokiri_Sword)))))

locations.Dodongos Cavern GS Vines Above Stairs:
has_explosives or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or can_use(Dins_Fire) or
                (logic_dc_staircase and can_use(Bow)) or
                (logic_dc_vines_gs and can_use(Longshot))

exits.Dodongos Cavern Climb:
has_explosives or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or 
                    can_use(Dins_Fire) or (logic_dc_staircase and can_use(Bow))

locations.Dodongos Cavern Lizalfos Upper Recovery:
(is_adult and (Hover_Boots or can_use(Longshot) or logic_dc_jump)) or
                ((here(can_blast_or_smash) or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and
                    ((is_child and (Slingshot or
                        (logic_dc_slingshot_skip))) or
                    (is_adult and Bow)))

(is_adult and (Hover_Boots or can_use(Longshot) or logic_dc_jump)) or
                ((here(can_blast_or_smash) or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and
                    ((is_child and (Slingshot or
                        (logic_dc_slingshot_skip))) or
                    (is_adult and Bow)))
locations.Dodongos Cavern Single Eye Switch Room P:
(can_blast_or_smash or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) or
                (is_adult and (Hover_Boots or can_use(Longshot) or logic_dc_jump))

(can_blast_or_smash or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) or
            (is_adult and (Hover_Boots or can_use(Longshot) or logic_dc_jump))
locations.Dodongos Cavern Blade Room Pot 1:
can_use(Boomerang) or
                at('Dodongos Cavern Far Bridge', True)
locations.Dodongos Cavern Blade Room Pot 2:
can_use(Boomerang) or
            at('Dodongos Cavern Far Bridge', True)
locations.Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag:
can_blast_or_smash or
                (logic_dc_scrub_room and is_adult and Progressive_Strength_Upgrade)

can_blast_or_smash or
                (logic_dc_scrub_room and is_adult and Progressive_Strength_Upgrade)

exits.Dodongos Cavern Far Bridge:
(is_adult and (Hover_Boots or can_use(Longshot) or logic_dc_jump)) or
                ((here(can_blast_or_smash) or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and
                    ((is_child and (Slingshot or
                        (logic_dc_slingshot_skip and (Sticks or Bombs or Kokiri_Sword)))) or
                    (is_adult and Bow)))
